name: Anelia
description: '''Aneliya Georgieva Atanasova''' ({{langx|bg|Анелия Георгиева Атанасова}}, born 1 July 1982), better known [[mononym|mononymously]] as '''Anelia''' ({{langx|bg|Анелия}}), is a [[Bulgaria]]n [[chalga|pop-folk]] singer. She gained popularity in Bulgaria with her second single "Погледни ме в очите" (''Look Me in the Eyes''), released in 2002. Throughout her career, 23 of her singles have topped the Bulgarian music charts which makes her one of the most successful recording female artists in [[Music of Bulgaria|Bulgarian music]]. In 2012, for the first time in her career, Anelia won the Artist of the Year award at the Annual Music Awards of Planeta TV.
